subject: Partnership Opportunity with {{company}}
message:
Hi {{name}},

I hope you are doing well. I noticed that your company, {{company}}, does not currently have a website. I’d love to help you establish an online presence that can boost your business and reach more customers.

If you’re interested, we can schedule a quick call to discuss how we can get started.

Schedule a Free Consultation

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,

{{sender_name}} {{sender_title}}
